fields.name: General Cleaning
fields.description: General cleaning is a routine cleaning service that maintains a clean and tidy environment. It typically involves tasks like dusting, vacuuming, mopping floors, cleaning bathrooms, and kitchen surfaces.

fields.name: Deep Cleaning
fields.description: Deep cleaning is a more intensive cleaning service that goes beyond routine cleaning. It involves a thorough cleaning of all surfaces, including hard-to-reach areas, to remove dirt, grime, and bacteria. Deep cleaning services often include tasks like cleaning behind appliances, scrubbing grout, and polishing fixtures.

fields.name: Specialized Cleaning
fields.description: Specialized cleaning refers to cleaning services that require specific expertise or equipment. This can include tasks like carpet cleaning, upholstery cleaning, window cleaning, and post-construction cleaning.

fields.name: Residential Deep Cleaning
fields.description: Residential deep cleaning is a deep cleaning service specifically tailored for homes. It involves a thorough cleaning of all areas of the home, including bedrooms, bathrooms, kitchens, living rooms, and hallways.

fields.name: Commercial Deep Cleaning
fields.description: Commercial deep cleaning is a deep cleaning service for businesses and commercial spaces. It involves a comprehensive cleaning of offices, retail stores, restaurants, and other commercial establishments.

fields.name: Seasonal Deep Cleaning
fields.description: Seasonal deep cleaning is a specialized cleaning service that focuses on cleaning tasks that are typically performed during specific seasons. This can include tasks like spring cleaning, fall cleaning, and winterizing.

fields.name: Installation Services
fields.description: Our expert technicians will install your new air conditioning unit efficiently and accurately. We ensure proper installation to optimize performance and energy efficiency.

fields.name: Maintenance Services
fields.description: Regular maintenance is crucial for the longevity and optimal performance of your air conditioning system.

fields.name: Aromatherapy
fields.description: Aromatherapy is a holistic healing practice that uses essential oils to improve physical and mental health. It can involve massage therapy, inhalation, or topical application of essential oils.

fields.name: Hair Services
fields.description: Hair services involve a variety of hair care treatments, including haircuts, styling, coloring, and perming.
